You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ ▢ ▢ X ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ X ▢ ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢

DESCRIPTION: The grid consists of a 5x5 arrangement of cells, some of which are shaded. The shaded cells are arranged in such a way that they form an 'X' shape in the center of the grid, with one 'X' oriented vertically and the other horizontally. The shaded cells are surrounded by unshaded cells, and there is an equal number of shaded and unshaded cells.

The black squares are diagonally adjacent in each row and column, forming two diagonal lines from the top left to the bottom right and vice versa.
